name: coloreet
description: Colors everywhere. Supercharged extension of the popular chalk library. Uses the also popular tailwindcss utility framework.

scripts.patch: npm run build && git add ./lib/* && git commit -m "build patch version" && npm version patch && git add ./package.json && git commit -m "bump patch version" && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm run build && npm version minor
scripts.major: npm run build && npm version major
